sentence: WhyThe WIFI only seems to be good in the rooms and in the main restaurant it is was non existent around the pool and breakfast area
I am at a complete loss as to how many people have given this hotel such a high ratingThe main aim of my holiday was to enjoy the sun and pool however that turned out impossible
The pool was icy cold in August
The same goes for the pool area there are not enough sunbeds or umbrellas for a hotel this size
Pool needs updating as beds and mattresses very tired
The grounds are good so maybe set up other lounging areas there whilst the pool is so small
Refurb outside pool
Pool was supposed to be heated but was not
Initially we were a bit disappointed to find the outdoor pool was not open and we had not been informed of this
Outdoor pool was being renovated it was too cold to use when we visited anyway
He was adorable telling us to leave our luggage behind the front desk informing us that we were free to use the pool and could have towels things she should have told us
After a 4 hour hike it was delightful to be able to cool off in the pool and then order a beer from the pool bar to sip on while drying off in the warm sun
If youWant to just chill then the outdoor pool is the perfect place
If an early morning swim before breakfast is a nice idea please do not expect it
comfy romparts of the hotel eg indoor pool were being renovated during the stay but we were not told when we checked in
surf school inside the hotel is awesometo be served some snacks by the pool
Would be nice if inside pool at least was heated so in rubbish weather it was more enjoyable especially with children
I believe there is a small heated indoor pool but I did not try it out and the breakfast spread was quite extensive
Swimming pools are only fair
The outside pool is heated also needed because most of the days it is windy and you have to shelter somehow
They are quite nice but I prefer to swim in the ocean
However the pool was very small and jacuzi did not work
The swimming pool was not deep enough
We like open water swimming and it is a drop down to the nearby beach to swim
It was too cold for us to use the outdoor pool so we plunged in the indoor pool one day and felt very relaxed
